      • addMetaData

        public ResourceCoreGeneric addMetaData(MetaDataRetriever config)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceCore
        Adds some container to store, retrieve and access the metadata of this image. If a container with the same title exists in the image's metadata, it is overwritten.
        Specified by:
        addMetaData in interface ResourceCore
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration instance with meat data to add or replace
        Returns:
        This instance to allow for use of the cascade design pattern
        See Also:

      • mergeMetaData

        public ResourceCore mergeMetaData(ResourceCore resource)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceCore
        Adds some metadata to a resource by copying it from another resource. In case some metadata with the same title already exists in this resource, that part of the metadata is updated, not copied.
        Specified by:
        mergeMetaData in interface ResourceCore
        Parameters:
        resource - A resource from which to copy the metadata.
        Returns:
        This instance to allow for use of the cascade design pattern
        See Also:
        ResourceCore.mergeMetaData(wrapScienceJ.resource.ResourceCore)
